text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump You're right. It's long past time for congressional investigation. This is a criminal matter. Trump should be arrested immediately and held in one of Barr's coronavirus infested hell holes, along with all the members of Congress who downplayed (and/or profited from) the virus.
